                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  Saint Alban's.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter KING HENRY VI, QUEEN MARGARET, GLOUCESTER,
CARDINAL, and SUFFOLK, with Falconers halloing</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN MARGARET</div>
                              <div class="line">Believe me, lords, for flying at the brook,</div>
                              <div class="line">I saw not better sport these seven years' day:</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet, by your leave, the wind was very high;</div>
                              <div class="line">And, ten to one, old Joan had not gone out.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                              <div class="line">But what a point, my lord, your falcon made,</div>
                              <div class="line">And what a pitch she flew above the rest!</div>
                              <div class="line">To see how God in all his creatures works!</div>
                              <div class="line">Yea, man and birds are fain of climbing high.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SUFFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">No marvel, an it like your majesty,</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord protector's hawks do tower so well;</div>
                              <div class="line">They know their master loves to be aloft,</div>
                              <div class="line">And bears his thoughts above his falcon's pitch.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, 'tis but a base ignoble mind</div>
                              <div class="line">That mounts no higher than a bird can soar.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL</div>
                              <div class="line">I thought as much; he would be above the clouds.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, my lord cardinal? how think you by that?</div>
                              <div class="line">Were it not good your grace could fly to heaven?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                              <div class="line">The treasury of everlasting joy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy heaven is on earth; thine eyes and thoughts</div>
                              <div class="line">Beat on a crown, the treasure of thy heart;</div>
                              <div class="line">Pernicious protector, dangerous peer,</div>
                              <div class="line">That smooth'st it so with king and commonweal!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">What, cardinal, is your priesthood grown peremptory?</div>
                              <div class="line">Tantaene animis coelestibus irae?</div>
                              <div class="line">Churchmen so hot? good uncle, hide such malice;</div>
                              <div class="line">With such holiness can you do it?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SUFFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">No malice, sir; no more than well becomes</div>
                              <div class="line">So good a quarrel and so bad a peer.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">As who, my lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SUFFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, as you, my lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">An't like your lordly lord-protectorship.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, Suffolk, England knows thine insolence.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN MARGARET</div>
                              <div class="line">And thy ambition, Gloucester.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                              <div class="line">I prithee, peace, good queen,</div>
                              <div class="line">And whet not on these furious peers;</div>
                              <div class="line">For blessed are the peacemakers on earth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me be blessed for the peace I make,</div>
                              <div class="line">Against this proud protector, with my sword!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to CARDINAL</span>  Faith, holy uncle, would</div>
                              <div class="line">'twere come to that!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to GLOUCESTER</span>  Marry, when thou darest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to CARDINAL</span>  Make up no factious</div>
                              <div class="line">numbers for the matter;</div>
                              <div class="line">In thine own person answer thy abuse.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to GLOUCESTER</span>  Ay, where thou darest</div>
                              <div class="line">not peep: an if thou darest,</div>
                              <div class="line">This evening, on the east side of the grove.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, my lords!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL</div>
                              <div class="line">Believe me, cousin Gloucester,</div>
                              <div class="line">Had not your man put up the fowl so suddenly,</div>
                              <div class="line">We had had more sport.</div>
                              <p>Aside to GLOUCESTER</p>
                              <div class="line">Come with thy two-hand sword.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">True, uncle.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to GLOUCESTER</span>  Are ye advised? the</div>
                              <div class="line">east side of the grove?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to CARDINAL</span>  Cardinal, I am with you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, how now, uncle Gloucester!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Talking of hawking; nothing else, my lord.</div>
                              <p>Aside to CARDINAL</p>
                              <div class="line">Now, by God's mother, priest, I'll shave your crown for this,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or all my fence shall fail.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to GLOUCESTER</span>  Medice, teipsum--</div>
                              <div class="line">Protector, see to't well, protect yourself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                              <div class="line">The winds grow high; so do your stomachs, lords.</div>
                              <div class="line">How irksome is this music to my heart!</div>
                              <div class="line">When such strings jar, what hope of harmony?</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray, my lords, let me compound this strife.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter a Townsman of Saint Alban's, crying 'A miracle!'</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">What means this noise?</div>
                              <div class="line">Fellow, what miracle dost thou proclaim?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Townsman</div>
                              <div class="line">A miracle! a miracle!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SUFFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">Come to the king and tell him what miracle.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Townsman</div>
                              <div class="line">Forsooth, a blind man at Saint Alban's shrine,</div>
                              <div class="line">Within this half-hour, hath received his sight;</div>
                              <div class="line">A man that ne'er saw in his life before.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, God be praised, that to believing souls</div>
                              <div class="line">Gives light in darkness, comfort in despair!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter the Mayor of Saint Alban's and his
brethren, bearing SIMPCOX, between two in a
chair, SIMPCOX's Wife following</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL</div>
                              <div class="line">Here comes the townsmen on procession,</div>
                              <div class="line">To present your highness with the man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                              <div class="line">Great is his comfort in this earthly vale,</div>
                              <div class="line">Although by his sight his sin be multiplied.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Stand by, my masters: bring him near the king;</div>
                              <div class="line">His highness' pleasure is to talk with him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                              <div class="line">Good fellow, tell us here the circumstance,</div>
                              <div class="line">That we for thee may glorify the Lord.</div>
                              <div class="line">What, hast thou been long blind and now restored?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPCOX</div>
                              <div class="line">Born blind, an't please your grace.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Wife</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, indeed, was he.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SUFFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">What woman is this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Wife</div>
                              <div class="line">His wife, an't like your worship.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Hadst thou been his mother, thou couldst have</div>
                              <div class="line">better told.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                              <div class="line">Where wert thou born?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPCOX</div>
                              <div class="line">At Berwick in the north, an't like your grace.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                              <div class="line">Poor soul, God's goodness hath been great to thee:</div>
                              <div class="line">Let never day nor night unhallow'd pass,</div>
                              <div class="line">But still remember what the Lord hath done.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN MARGARET</div>
                              <div class="line">Tell me, good fellow, camest thou here by chance,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or of devotion, to this holy shrine?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPCOX</div>
                              <div class="line">God knows, of pure devotion; being call'd</div>
                              <div class="line">A hundred times and oftener, in my sleep,</div>
                              <div class="line">By good Saint Alban; who said, 'Simpcox, come,</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, offer at my shrine, and I will help thee.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Wife</div>
                              <div class="line">Most true, forsooth; and many time and oft</div>
                              <div class="line">Myself have heard a voice to call him so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL</div>
                              <div class="line">What, art thou lame?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPCOX</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, God Almighty help me!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SUFFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">How camest thou so?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPCOX</div>
                              <div class="line">A fall off of a tree.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Wife</div>
                              <div class="line">A plum-tree, master.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">How long hast thou been blind?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPCOX</div>
                              <div class="line">Born so, master.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">What, and wouldst climb a tree?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPCOX</div>
                              <div class="line">But that in all my life, when I was a youth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Wife</div>
                              <div class="line">Too true; and bought his climbing very dear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Mass, thou lovedst plums well, that wouldst</div>
                              <div class="line">venture so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPCOX</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, good master, my wife desired some damsons,</div>
                              <div class="line">And made me climb, with danger of my life.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">A subtle knave! but yet it shall not serve.</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me see thine eyes: wink now: now open them:</div>
                              <div class="line">In my opinion yet thou seest not well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPCOX</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, master, clear as day, I thank God and</div>
                              <div class="line">Saint Alban.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Say'st thou me so? What colour is this cloak of?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPCOX</div>
                              <div class="line">Red, master; red as blood.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, that's well said. What colour is my gown of?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPCOX</div>
                              <div class="line">Black, forsooth: coal-black as jet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, then, thou know'st what colour jet is of?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SUFFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">And yet, I think, jet did he never see.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">But cloaks and gowns, before this day, a many.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Wife</div>
                              <div class="line">Never, before this day, in all his life.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Tell me, sirrah, what's my name?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPCOX</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, master, I know not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">What's his name?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPCOX</div>
                              <div class="line">I know not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor his?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPCOX</div>
                              <div class="line">No, indeed, master.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">What's thine own name?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPCOX</div>
                              <div class="line">Saunder Simpcox, an if it please you, master.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Then, Saunder, sit there, the lyingest knave in</div>
                              <div class="line">Christendom. If thou hadst been born blind, thou</div>
                              <div class="line">mightest as well have known all our names as thus to</div>
                              <div class="line">name the several colours we do wear. Sight may</div>
                              <div class="line">distinguish of colours, but suddenly to nominate them</div>
                              <div class="line">all, it is impossible. My lords, Saint Alban here</div>
                              <div class="line">hath done a miracle; and would ye not think his</div>
                              <div class="line">cunning to be great, that could restore this cripple</div>
                              <div class="line">to his legs again?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPCOX</div>
                              <div class="line">O master, that you could!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">My masters of Saint Alban's, have you not beadles in</div>
                              <div class="line">your town, and things called whips?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Mayor</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, my lord, if it please your grace.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Then send for one presently.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Mayor</div>
                              <div class="line">Sirrah, go fetch the beadle hither straight.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit an Attendant</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Now fetch me a stool hither by and by. Now, sirrah,</div>
                              <div class="line">if you mean to save yourself from whipping, leap me</div>
                              <div class="line">over this stool and run away.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPCOX</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, master, I am not able to stand alone:</div>
                              <div class="line">You go about to torture me in vain.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter a Beadle with whips</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, sir, we must have you find your legs. Sirrah</div>
                              <div class="line">beadle, whip him till he leap over that same stool.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Beadle</div>
                              <div class="line">I will, my lord. Come on, sirrah; off with your</div>
                              <div class="line">doublet quickly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPCOX</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, master, what shall I do? I am not able to stand.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>After the Beadle hath hit him once, he leaps over
the stool and runs away; and they follow and cry, 'A miracle!'</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                              <div class="line">O God, seest Thou this, and bearest so long?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN MARGARET</div>
                              <div class="line">It made me laugh to see the villain run.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Follow the knave; and take this drab away.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Wife</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, sir, we did it for pure need.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Let them be whipped through every market-town, till</div>
                              <div class="line">they come to Berwick, from whence they came.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt Wife, Beadle, Mayor, &c</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL</div>
                              <div class="line">Duke Humphrey has done a miracle to-day.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SUFFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">True; made the lame to leap and fly away.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">But you have done more miracles than I;</div>
                              <div class="line">You made in a day, my lord, whole towns to fly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter BUCKINGHAM</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                              <div class="line">What tidings with our cousin Buckingham?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BUCKINGHAM</div>
                              <div class="line">Such as my heart doth tremble to unfold.</div>
                              <div class="line">A sort of naughty persons, lewdly bent,</div>
                              <div class="line">Under the countenance and confederacy</div>
                              <div class="line">Of Lady Eleanor, the protector's wife,</div>
                              <div class="line">The ringleader and head of all this rout,</div>
                              <div class="line">Have practised dangerously against your state,</div>
                              <div class="line">Dealing with witches and with conjurers:</div>
                              <div class="line">Whom we have apprehended in the fact;</div>
                              <div class="line">Raising up wicked spirits from under ground,</div>
                              <div class="line">Demanding of King Henry's life and death,</div>
                              <div class="line">And other of your highness' privy-council;</div>
                              <div class="line">As more at large your grace shall understand.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to GLOUCESTER</span>  And so, my lord protector,</div>
                              <div class="line">by this means</div>
                              <div class="line">Your lady is forthcoming yet at London.</div>
                              <div class="line">This news, I think, hath turn'd your weapon's edge;</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis like, my lord, you will not keep your hour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Ambitious churchman, leave to afflict my heart:</div>
                              <div class="line">Sorrow and grief have vanquish'd all my powers;</div>
                              <div class="line">And, vanquish'd as I am, I yield to thee,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or to the meanest groom.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                              <div class="line">O God, what mischiefs work the wicked ones,</div>
                              <div class="line">Heaping confusion on their own heads thereby!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN MARGARET</div>
                              <div class="line">Gloucester, see here the tainture of thy nest.</div>
                              <div class="line">And look thyself be faultless, thou wert best.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, for myself, to heaven I do appeal,</div>
                              <div class="line">How I have loved my king and commonweal:</div>
                              <div class="line">And, for my wife, I know not how it stands;</div>
                              <div class="line">Sorry I am to hear what I have heard:</div>
                              <div class="line">Noble she is, but if she have forgot</div>
                              <div class="line">Honour and virtue and conversed with such</div>
                              <div class="line">As, like to pitch, defile nobility,</div>
                              <div class="line">I banish her my bed and company</div>
                              <div class="line">And give her as a prey to law and shame,</div>
                              <div class="line">That hath dishonour'd Gloucester's honest name.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, for this night we will repose us here:</div>
                              <div class="line">To-morrow toward London back again,</div>
                              <div class="line">To look into this business thoroughly</div>
                              <div class="line">And call these foul offenders to their answers</div>
                              <div class="line">And poise the cause in justice' equal scales,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose beam stands sure, whose rightful cause prevails.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Flourish. Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  London. YORK'S garden.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter YORK, SALISBURY, and WARWICK</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, my good Lords of Salisbury and Warwick,</div>
                              <div class="line">Our simple supper ended, give me leave</div>
                              <div class="line">In this close walk to satisfy myself,</div>
                              <div class="line">In craving your opinion of my title,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which is infallible, to England's crown.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SALISBURY</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, I long to hear it at full.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WARWICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Sweet York, begin: and if thy claim be good,</div>
                              <div class="line">The Nevils are thy subjects to command.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Then thus:</div>
                              <div class="line">Edward the Third, my lords, had seven sons:</div>
                              <div class="line">The first, Edward the Black Prince, Prince of Wales;</div>
                              <div class="line">The second, William of Hatfield, and the third,</div>
                              <div class="line">Lionel Duke of Clarence: next to whom</div>
                              <div class="line">Was John of Gaunt, the Duke of Lancaster;</div>
                              <div class="line">The fifth was Edmund Langley, Duke of York;</div>
                              <div class="line">The sixth was Thomas of Woodstock, Duke of Gloucester;</div>
                              <div class="line">William of Windsor was the seventh and last.</div>
                              <div class="line">Edward the Black Prince died before his father</div>
                              <div class="line">And left behind him Richard, his only son,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who after Edward the Third's death reign'd as king;</div>
                              <div class="line">Till Henry Bolingbroke, Duke of Lancaster,</div>
                              <div class="line">The eldest son and heir of John of Gaunt,</div>
                              <div class="line">Crown'd by the name of Henry the Fourth,</div>
                              <div class="line">Seized on the realm, deposed the rightful king,</div>
                              <div class="line">Sent his poor queen to France, from whence she came,</div>
                              <div class="line">And him to Pomfret; where, as all you know,</div>
                              <div class="line">Harmless Richard was murder'd traitorously.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WARWICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Father, the duke hath told the truth:</div>
                              <div class="line">Thus got the house of Lancaster the crown.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Which now they hold by force and not by right;</div>
                              <div class="line">For Richard, the first son's heir, being dead,</div>
                              <div class="line">The issue of the next son should have reign'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SALISBURY</div>
                              <div class="line">But William of Hatfield died without an heir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">The third son, Duke of Clarence, from whose line</div>
                              <div class="line">I claimed the crown, had issue, Philippe, a daughter,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who married Edmund Mortimer, Earl of March:</div>
                              <div class="line">Edmund had issue, Roger Earl of March;</div>
                              <div class="line">Roger had issue, Edmund, Anne and Eleanor.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SALISBURY</div>
                              <div class="line">This Edmund, in the reign of Bolingbroke,</div>
                              <div class="line">As I have read, laid claim unto the crown;</div>
                              <div class="line">And, but for Owen Glendower, had been king,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who kept him in captivity till he died.</div>
                              <div class="line">But to the rest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">His eldest sister, Anne,</div>
                              <div class="line">My mother, being heir unto the crown</div>
                              <div class="line">Married Richard Earl of Cambridge; who was son</div>
                              <div class="line">To Edmund Langley, Edward the Third's fifth son.</div>
                              <div class="line">By her I claim the kingdom: she was heir</div>
                              <div class="line">To Roger Earl of March, who was the son</div>
                              <div class="line">Of Edmund Mortimer, who married Philippe,</div>
                              <div class="line">Sole daughter unto Lionel Duke of Clarence:</div>
                              <div class="line">So, if the issue of the elder son</div>
                              <div class="line">Succeed before the younger, I am king.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WARWICK</div>
                              <div class="line">What plain proceeding is more plain than this?</div>
                              <div class="line">Henry doth claim the crown from John of Gaunt,</div>
                              <div class="line">The fourth son; York claims it from the third.</div>
                              <div class="line">Till Lionel's issue fails, his should not reign:</div>
                              <div class="line">It fails not yet, but flourishes in thee</div>
                              <div class="line">And in thy sons, fair slips of such a stock.</div>
                              <div class="line">Then, father Salisbury, kneel we together;</div>
                              <div class="line">And in this private plot be we the first</div>
                              <div class="line">That shall salute our rightful sovereign</div>
                              <div class="line">With honour of his birthright to the crown.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">Long live our sovereign Richard, England's king!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">We thank you, lords. But I am not your king</div>
                              <div class="line">Till I be crown'd and that my sword be stain'd</div>
                              <div class="line">With heart-blood of the house of Lancaster;</div>
                              <div class="line">And that's not suddenly to be perform'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">But with advice and silent secrecy.</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you as I do in these dangerous days:</div>
                              <div class="line">Wink at the Duke of Suffolk's insolence,</div>
                              <div class="line">At Beaufort's pride, at Somerset's ambition,</div>
                              <div class="line">At Buckingham and all the crew of them,</div>
                              <div class="line">Till they have snared the shepherd of the flock,</div>
                              <div class="line">That virtuous prince, the good Duke Humphrey:</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis that they seek, and they in seeking that</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall find their deaths, if York can prophesy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SALISBURY</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, break we off; we know your mind at full.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WARWICK</div>
                              <div class="line">My heart assures me that the Earl of Warwick</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall one day make the Duke of York a king.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">And, Nevil, this I do assure myself:</div>
                              <div class="line">Richard shall live to make the Earl of Warwick</div>
                              <div class="line">The greatest man in England but the king.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. SCENE III.  A hall of justice.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Sound trumpets. Enter KING HENRY VI, QUEEN
MARGARET, GLOUCESTER, YORK, SUFFOLK, and SALISBURY;
the DUCHESS, MARGARET JOURDAIN, SOUTHWELL, HUME,
and BOLINGBROKE, under guard</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                              <div class="line">Stand forth, Dame Eleanor Cobham, Gloucester's wife:</div>
                              <div class="line">In sight of God and us, your guilt is great:</div>
                              <div class="line">Receive the sentence of the law for sins</div>
                              <div class="line">Such as by God's book are adjudged to death.</div>
                              <div class="line">You four, from hence to prison back again;</div>
                              <div class="line">From thence unto the place of execution:</div>
                              <div class="line">The witch in Smithfield shall be burn'd to ashes,</div>
                              <div class="line">And you three shall be strangled on the gallows.</div>
                              <div class="line">You, madam, for you are more nobly born,</div>
                              <div class="line">Despoiled of your honour in your life,</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall, after three days' open penance done,</div>
                              <div class="line">Live in your country here in banishment,</div>
                              <div class="line">With Sir John Stanley, in the Isle of Man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUCHESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Welcome is banishment; welcome were my death.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Eleanor, the law, thou see'st, hath judged thee:</div>
                              <div class="line">I cannot justify whom the law condemns.</div>
                              <p>Exeunt DUCHESS and other prisoners, guarded</p>
                              <div class="line">Mine eyes are full of tears, my heart of grief.</div>
                              <div class="line">Ah, Humphrey, this dishonour in thine age</div>
                              <div class="line">Will bring thy head with sorrow to the ground!</div>
                              <div class="line">I beseech your majesty, give me leave to go;</div>
                              <div class="line">Sorrow would solace and mine age would ease.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                              <div class="line">Stay, Humphrey Duke of Gloucester: ere thou go,</div>
                              <div class="line">Give up thy staff: Henry will to himself</div>
                              <div class="line">Protector be; and God shall be my hope,</div>
                              <div class="line">My stay, my guide and lantern to my feet:</div>
                              <div class="line">And go in peace, Humphrey, no less beloved</div>
                              <div class="line">Than when thou wert protector to thy King.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN MARGARET</div>
                              <div class="line">I see no reason why a king of years</div>
                              <div class="line">Should be to be protected like a child.</div>
                              <div class="line">God and King Henry govern England's realm.</div>
                              <div class="line">Give up your staff, sir, and the king his realm.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">My staff? here, noble Henry, is my staff:</div>
                              <div class="line">As willingly do I the same resign</div>
                              <div class="line">As e'er thy father Henry made it mine;</div>
                              <div class="line">And even as willingly at thy feet I leave it</div>
                              <div class="line">As others would ambitiously receive it.</div>
                              <div class="line">Farewell, good king: when I am dead and gone,</div>
                              <div class="line">May honourable peace attend thy throne!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN MARGARET</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, now is Henry king, and Margaret queen;</div>
                              <div class="line">And Humphrey Duke of Gloucester scarce himself,</div>
                              <div class="line">That bears so shrewd a maim; two pulls at once;</div>
                              <div class="line">His lady banish'd, and a limb lopp'd off.</div>
                              <div class="line">This staff of honour raught, there let it stand</div>
                              <div class="line">Where it best fits to be, in Henry's hand.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SUFFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">Thus droops this lofty pine and hangs his sprays;</div>
                              <div class="line">Thus Eleanor's pride dies in her youngest days.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Lords, let him go. Please it your majesty,</div>
                              <div class="line">This is the day appointed for the combat;</div>
                              <div class="line">And ready are the appellant and defendant,</div>
                              <div class="line">The armourer and his man, to enter the lists,</div>
                              <div class="line">So please your highness to behold the fight.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN MARGARET</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, good my lord; for purposely therefore</div>
                              <div class="line">Left I the court, to see this quarrel tried.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                              <div class="line">O God's name, see the lists and all things fit:</div>
                              <div class="line">Here let them end it; and God defend the right!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">I never saw a fellow worse bested,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or more afraid to fight, than is the appellant,</div>
                              <div class="line">The servant of this armourer, my lords.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter at one door, HORNER, the Armourer, and his
Neighbours, drinking to him so much that he is drunk;
and he enters with a drum before him and his staff
with a sand-bag fastened to it; and at the other
door PETER, his man, with a drum and sand-bag, and
'Prentices drinking to him</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Neighbour</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, neighbour Horner, I drink to you in a cup of</div>
                              <div class="line">sack: and fear not, neighbour, you shall do well enough.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Neighbour</div>
                              <div class="line">And here, neighbour, here's a cup of charneco.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Third Neighbour</div>
                              <div class="line">And here's a pot of good double beer, neighbour:</div>
                              <div class="line">drink, and fear not your man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORNER</div>
                              <div class="line">Let it come, i' faith, and I'll pledge you all; and</div>
                              <div class="line">a fig for Peter!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First 'Prentice</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, Peter, I drink to thee: and be not afraid.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second 'Prentice</div>
                              <div class="line">Be merry, Peter, and fear not thy master: fight</div>
                              <div class="line">for credit of the 'prentices.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETER</div>
                              <div class="line">I thank you all: drink, and pray for me, I pray</div>
                              <div class="line">you; for I think I have taken my last draught in</div>
                              <div class="line">this world. Here, Robin, an if I die, I give thee</div>
                              <div class="line">my apron: and, Will, thou shalt have my hammer:</div>
                              <div class="line">and here, Tom, take all the money that I have. O</div>
                              <div class="line">Lord bless me! I pray God! for I am never able to</div>
                              <div class="line">deal with my master, he hath learnt me so much fence already.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SALISBURY</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, leave your drinking, and fall to blows.</div>
                              <div class="line">Sirrah, what's thy name?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETER</div>
                              <div class="line">Peter, forsooth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SALISBURY</div>
                              <div class="line">Peter! what more?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETER</div>
                              <div class="line">Thump.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SALISBURY</div>
                              <div class="line">Thump! then see thou thump thy master well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORNER</div>
                              <div class="line">Masters, I am come hither, as it were, upon my man's</div>
                              <div class="line">instigation, to prove him a knave and myself an</div>
                              <div class="line">honest man: and touching the Duke of York, I will</div>
                              <div class="line">take my death, I never meant him any ill, nor the</div>
                              <div class="line">king, nor the queen: and therefore, Peter, have at</div>
                              <div class="line">thee with a downright blow!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Dispatch: this knave's tongue begins to double.</div>
                              <div class="line">Sound, trumpets, alarum to the combatants!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Alarum. They fight, and PETER strikes him down</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORNER</div>
                              <div class="line">Hold, Peter, hold! I confess, I confess treason.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Dies</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Take away his weapon. Fellow, thank God, and the</div>
                              <div class="line">good wine in thy master's way.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETER</div>
                              <div class="line">O God, have I overcome mine enemy in this presence?</div>
                              <div class="line">O Peter, thou hast prevailed in right!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                              <div class="line">Go, take hence that traitor from our sight;</div>
                              <div class="line">For his death we do perceive his guilt:</div>
                              <div class="line">And God in justice hath revealed to us</div>
                              <div class="line">The truth and innocence of this poor fellow,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which he had thought to have murder'd wrongfully.</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, fellow, follow us for thy reward.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Sound a flourish. Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.5">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>4. SCENE IV.  A street.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter GLOUCESTER and his Servingmen, in
mourning cloaks</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Thus sometimes hath the brightest day a cloud;</div>
                              <div class="line">And after summer evermore succeeds</div>
                              <div class="line">Barren winter, with his wrathful nipping cold:</div>
                              <div class="line">So cares and joys abound, as seasons fleet.</div>
                              <div class="line">Sirs, what's o'clock?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Servants</div>
                              <div class="line">Ten, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Ten is the hour that was appointed me</div>
                              <div class="line">To watch the coming of my punish'd duchess:</div>
                              <div class="line">Uneath may she endure the flinty streets,</div>
                              <div class="line">To tread them with her tender-feeling feet.</div>
                              <div class="line">Sweet Nell, ill can thy noble mind abrook</div>
                              <div class="line">The abject people gazing on thy face,</div>
                              <div class="line">With envious looks, laughing at thy shame,</div>
                              <div class="line">That erst did follow thy proud chariot-wheels</div>
                              <div class="line">When thou didst ride in triumph through the streets.</div>
                              <div class="line">But, soft! I think she comes; and I'll prepare</div>
                              <div class="line">My tear-stain'd eyes to see her miseries.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter the DUCHESS in a white sheet, and a taper
burning in her hand; with STANLEY, the Sheriff,
and Officers</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">So please your grace, we'll take her from the sheriff.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">No, stir not, for your lives; let her pass by.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUCHESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Come you, my lord, to see my open shame?</div>
                              <div class="line">Now thou dost penance too. Look how they gaze!</div>
                              <div class="line">See how the giddy multitude do point,</div>
                              <div class="line">And nod their heads, and throw their eyes on thee!</div>
